★ VPSMT - VPS Management/Monitoring Tool ★

**What is VPSMT?**

VPSMT (aka VPS Management/Monitoring Tool) is a web-based application that makes it easy for you to monitor and manage all of your solusvm / buyvm (stallion) VPS. It features:

- Manage and monitor your SolusVM / BuyVM (Stallion) VPS in one place
- Stylish dashboard gives you a quick overview of your VPS real time status (RAM usage, Hard Disk usage and Bandwidth Usage)
- Keep track of your VPS’s uptime, downtime and average response time (new feature)
- Boot/Reboot/Shutdown VPS manually
- Automatically boot/reboot if VPS is offline
- Monitoring TCP Ports (http: 80, https: 443 ftp: 25 etc)
- Support one or multiple SolusVM / BuyBM based vps (Client API must be enabled)
- Pay one small license fee and receive lifetime update
- Written in PHP + MySQL + Ajax + jQuery
